Constructor Detail

ObjectFile

public ObjectFile(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String containerName,
                  java.lang.String baseUrl,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  boolean auth)
           throws java.io.IOException
This class represents a file object in a container on the objectstorage server

Parameters:
name - the name of the server side objectstorage object
containerName - the name of the container this object resides in
baseUrl - the base sift rest api url
username - the username for this session
password - the password for this session
auth - whether to auth this transaction with the REST api if not (useful if you have not yet connected this session or if you need/want to re-auth)
Throws:
java.io.IOException
